Text: Re Annual Christmas Dinnerwill be getting in town at pm on Friday the nd I would love to go to dinner so if you make reservations for that night I can probably make it around pm If everyone else cant do it on the nd then I hope to see you all sometime before I head back to California Jen From Laura Jahnke ReplyTo To Susan Edwards Ash Mace Katy Hester Emily Hillegeist Corinne ellcom Corinne ellcom Laura White tageStorescom indspring Subject Annual Christmas Dinner Date Fri Dec Hi Girls Its that time again We need to get everyone together for our annual Christmas Dinner I have spoken to many of you and tried to come up with a good time for everyone Unfortunately there doesnt seem to be a perfect day but how about FridayDec nd Please respond and tell me what you think I have had a few suggestions for a placeChurrascos Americas Ruggles Benjis Sullivansplease send a suggestion Dont say it doesnt matter because majority vote will win and there will be no recount The time will probably be around pm I know the nd is close to Christmas so the th has also been suggestedbut I am afraid not everyone will be in town yet Please send me your thoughts on the day restauraunt and if we should plan something after dinner I cant wait to see everyone and hope all can make it Laura Get more from the Web FREE MSN Explorer download
